nodes.text: Esdo was a male Rodian who served as a senator's aide on Coruscant during the Imperial Era. Later, he was imprisoned at Ashmead's Lock prison on the planet Kashyyyk. There, he was forcibly implanted with an inorganic biochip implant that turned him into an unwilling drone of Fleet Admiral Gallius Rax. In 5 ABY, Esdo was liberated by a rebel team led by Norra Wexley and Han Solo. Later, Esdo took part in the attack on Chandrila and shot Commodore Kyrsta Agate in the face before being subdued by Norra.
